title: New language for EU West
body: Hey, my name its Rafael and im Portuguese. Sorry about my english but i come to ask to Riot Games if we can get a new language no Eu West. I see a Lot of Brazillean guys and I get a little jealous. If you can do that for me :3 Thank you :P

replies.body: Each region has their own [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  I don't recommend trying to add unsupported languages because you can run into issues trying to modify files.  Currently, it looks like only Brazil supports Portuguese.  Let me know if that clears things up!
